description: A humorous misunderstanding about putting out a cat.
title: Hot Cat
n_1: Tom and Jerry are in the living room.
c1_1: Tom, can you put the cat out?
c1_2: Wait, why is it so hot?
c2_3: I didn't realize it was on fire!
n_4: The fire is extinguished, and the cat is safe.
c1_4: Let's keep the cat away from candles.
